item.title: About
item.description:
\(\Bbb{MADE}\enspace\Bbb{BY}\enspace\color{#83A78D}\mathcal{N}
egmedspace
egmedspace
egthickspace{ orall}\) Who is speaking? Hi there, this is Eejain. Many tags can be attached to me: gender-queer, born and raised Chinese, a half-made geek plus self-taught scribbler, a young scholar dangling between publish or perish, and an enthusiast with all things quaint yet profound. But none of them will stick. Pared to the bone, I am just a curious soul that wants to share bits and pieces of thoughts with you.
